HyperMarks: The easiest way to save and organize your favorite websites.

HyperMarks allows you to save URLs with custom and private keywords directly from the search bar. Simply type in the keyword you want to use and HyperMarks will create a custom bookmark for you. Access your saved bookmarks by typing "hy"+space+hypermark in the search bar.

HyperMarks is the perfect way to save time and stay organized. With HyperMarks, you can easily save your favorite articles, recipes, videos, and more without having to leave the search bar.

Here are just a few of the benefits of using HyperMarks:

• Save your favorite websites in seconds.
• Search your bookmarks by keyword.
• Access your bookmarks from anywhere on the web.

Install HyperMarks today and start saving time and staying organized!
